body.initial_step: This tour will guide you through the main functions of the app to get you started quickly.
body.net_worth_step: In this view you can track all your gains and loses now or in the past and how much your (public) stash is worth
body.bulk_sell_step: In this view you can share your stash items via generated image and message to various Discord communities
body.settings_step: In this view you can manage your general, interface, pricing or data reset settings.
body.profile_step: In this area you can manage your profiles, and create multiple ones for different setups for quick access.
body.snapshot_step: This is where you take snapshots to see your current net worth, you can also enable automatic snapshotting in the settings.
body.overlay_step: Here you can toggle the overlay, for a slim overview while you map!
body.group_step: Here you can group up with your friends to see your combined net worth status.
body.notifications_step: Everything that happens in the app will be displayed here.
body.support_panel_step: Here you can see what's new in latest release, report a bug, submit a feature request, re-run this tour or get our discord server invitation.
body.currency_switch: Clicking this button will switch the currency type between chaos and exalts.
body.reset_income: Click here to quickly reset your income if you think its skewed!
